Module kivakit.web.wicket
Package com.telenav.kivakit.web.wicket.behaviors.status

Class MessageColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wicket.behavior.Behavior
      • org.apache.wicket.AttributeModifier
        • com.telenav.kivakit.web.wicket.behaviors.status.MessageColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.wicket.IComponentAwareEventSink, org.apache.wicket.markup.html.IComponentAwareHeaderContributor, org.apache.wicket.util.io.IClusterable
    public class MessageColor
extends org.apache.wicket.AttributeModifier
    A Wicket AttributeModifier that changes the class of the component it is attached to based on Message.status(). This is used to highlight success, warning and failure conditions visually using the *kivakit-problem*, *kivakit-warning* and *kivakit-information* CSS classes in KivaKitTheme.css.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
